name: ClaimsFuncApp
description: This is a sample Azure Functions Application. 1. The function 'ReadQIngestWebApi' reads claims data from an Azure Storage Queue and then injests the data to a Claims db by calling a Web API. 2. The function 'GetSbQIngestWebApi' reads claims (JSON) data from an Azure Service Bus Queue and then posts the claims to the backend by calling the Claims Web API.
author: Ganesh Radhakrishnan (Microsoft)
